shareableLinkCopied: Shareable link copied to the clipboard. Click here to view the screenshot.
errorwhileTakingScreenshot: An error occurred while taking the screenshot.
clickToOpenLogs: Click here to open the logs.

polkitDialog.title: Polkit not found
polkitDialog.message: IPFS can't be added to /usr/local/bin/ without polkit agent.

noPermissionDialog.title: Permesoj forestas
noPermissionDialog.message: IPFS couldn't be added to /usr/local/bin/, either because you entered the wrong password, or you denied permission.

ipfsNotRunningDialog.title: IPFS ne estas funkcianta
ipfsNotRunningDialog.message: IPFS needs to be running to perform this action. Do you want to start the daemon?

recoverableErrorDialog.title: Iu eraro okazis
recoverableErrorDialog.message: An error occurred but it does not prevent the execution of IPFS Desktop. You can either inspect the logs for yourself or report the error to the developers.

cannotConnectToApiDialog.title: Ne povas konekti al API
cannotConnectToApiDialog.message: IPFS Desktop cannot connect to the API address provided: { addr }.

ipfsDesktopHasShutdownDialog.title: IPFS Desktop has shutdown
ipfsDesktopHasShutdownDialog.message: IPFS Desktop has shutdown because of an error. You can restart the app or report the error to the developers, which requires a GitHub account.

moveRepositoryWarnDialog.title: Movi deponejon
moveRepositoryWarnDialog.message: If your repository is taking too much space on your main drive, you can move it to some other location. Bear in mind that the new location must always be available in order for IPFS Desktop to work correctly.

moveRepositorySuccessDialog.title: Deponejo estas movita sukcese
moveRepositorySuccessDialog.message: Your repository was successfully moved to { location } and your configuration was updated. The daemon will now start up again.

moveRepositorySameDirDialog.title: Same directory selected
moveRepositorySameDirDialog.message: The directory you picked is the same as the current one: { location }. Hence, no changes will be made.

moveRepositoryDirExists.title: Dosierujo jam ekzistas
moveRepositoryDirExists.message: La dosierujo { location }jam ekzistas. Provu uzi alian.

busyPortsDialog.title: Retpordoj estas okupitaj
busyPortsDialog.message: The ports { port1 } and { port2 } are not available. Do you want to use { alt1 } and { alt2 } instead?
busyPortsDialog.action: Use ports { alt1 } and { alt2 } instead

busyPortDialog.title: Retpordo estas okupita
busyPortDialog.message: The port { port } is not available. Do you want to use { alt } instead?

multipleBusyPortsDialog.title: Retpordoj estas okupitaj
multipleBusyPortsDialog.message: Cannot bind to one or more of the API or Gateway addresses because the ports are busy.

itemsAddedNotification.title: Items added
itemsAddedNotification.message: { count } items added to your IPFS node. A shareable link was copied to your clipboard.

itemAddedNotification.title: Item added
itemAddedNotification.message: Item added to your IPFS node. A shareable link was copied to your clipboard.

itemsFailedNotification.title: Failed to add items
itemsFailedNotification.message: Could not add your items to your node.

updateAvailableDialog.title: Ĝisdatigo estas disponebla
updateAvailableDialog.message: A new version ({ version }) of IPFS Desktop is available. The download will begin shortly in the background.

updateNotAvailableDialog.title: Ĝisdatigo ne estas disponebla
updateNotAvailableDialog.message: You are on the latest version of IPFS Desktop ({ version }).

updateErrorDialog.title: Ne povas elŝuti ĝisdatigon
updateErrorDialog.message: It was not possible to download the update. Please check your Internet connection and try again.

updateDownloadedDialog.title: IPFS Desktop Update
updateDownloadedDialog.message: An update to IPFS Desktop { version } is available. Would you like to install it now?

updateDownloadedNotification.title: IPFS Desktop Update
updateDownloadedNotification.message: An update to IPFS Desktop { version } is available.

runGarbageCollectorWarning.title: Rubkolektilo
runGarbageCollectorWarning.message: Running the garbage collector (GC) will remove from your repository all objects that are not pinned or on your MFS. This may take a while. Do you wish to proceed?

moveRepositoryFailed.title: Movi deponejon
moveRepositoryFailed.message: Could not move the repository from "{ currDir }" to "{ newDir }".

runGarbageCollectorErrored.title: Rubkolektilo
runGarbageCollectorErrored.message: The garbage collector run could not be completed successfully.

launchAtLoginNotSupported.title: Eraro
launchAtLoginNotSupported.message: Launch at login is not supported on your platform.

launchAtLoginFailed.title: Eraro
launchAtLoginFailed.message: Launch at login could not be enabled on your machine.

enableGlobalTakeScreenshotShortcut.title: Enable screenshot shortcut
enableGlobalTakeScreenshotShortcut.message: By enabling this, the shortcut "{ accelerator }" will be available to take screenshots as long as IPFS Desktop is running.

setCustomIpfsBinaryConfirmation.title: Custom IPFS binary
setCustomIpfsBinaryConfirmation.message: By setting a custom IPFS, IPFS Desktop will no longer use the bundled IPFS version and will use the binary you specify. Do you wish to proceed?

setCustomIpfsBinarySuccess.title: Custom IPFS binary
setCustomIpfsBinarySuccess.message: IPFS Desktop will start using the binary located at { path }. To start using it, IPFS needs to be restarted first.

clearCustomIpfsBinarySuccess.title: Clear custom IPFS binary
clearCustomIpfsBinarySuccess.message: The custom IPFS binary was cleared. To start using the bundled IPFS version, IPFS needs to be restarted first.

unresponsiveWindowDialog.title: IPFS Desktop became unresponsive
unresponsiveWindowDialog.message: Ongoing operation is taking more resources than expected. Do you wish to abort, and forcefully reload the interface?

migrationDialog.title: IPFS Desktop Migration
migrationDialog.message: One moment! IPFS Desktop needs to run the latest data store migrations:

startupFailedDialog.title: IPFS Desktop Startup Has Failed
startupFailedDialog.message: IPFS node has encountered an error and startup could not be completed:

repositoryMustBeDirectoryDialog.title: IPFS Repository Must Be a Directory
repositoryMustBeDirectoryDialog.message:
The repository at “{ path }” is invalid, as it is not a directory.

Before starting IPFS Desktop again, please rename the old repository to “.ipfs.backup”. Please note that this will make IPFS Desktop generate a new repository.

repositoryConfigurationIsMissingDialog.title: IPFS Repository Configuration Is Missing
repositoryConfigurationIsMissingDialog.message:
The repository at “{ path }” does not have a “config” file. The “config” file must be a valid JSON file.

Before starting IPFS Desktop again, please fix the configuration file or rename the old repository to “.ipfs.backup”. Please note that by renaming the old repository, IPFS Desktop will generate a new repository.

privateNetworkDialog.title: Private Network IPFS Repository
privateNetworkDialog.message: The repository at “{ path }” is part of a private network, which is not supported by IPFS Desktop.

invalidRepositoryDialog.title: Invalid IPFS Repository or Configuration File
invalidRepositoryDialog.message:
The repository at “{ path }” or its configuration is invalid. The “config” file must be a valid JSON.

Before starting IPFS Desktop again, please fix the configuration file or rename the old repository to “.ipfs.backup”. Please note that by renaming the old repository, IPFS Desktop will generate a new repository
